    public class CsvAct
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    sevgi Class CsvAct is created for actions on csv file.

      • read

        private static void read()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        This function reads the Csv file and uploads the information to into the member variable roomlist, which holds the room objects list.

      • searchRoom

        public static int searchRoom(java.lang.String room_type)
        Parameters:
        room_type -
        Returns:
        Return type is integer.If hotel has available room , this function returns roomlist index which holds available room information else returns -1.

      • searchCheck

        public static int searchCheck(java.lang.String id,
                              java.lang.String phone,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              int room_no)
        The searcCheck function checks whether there is record is related to the object informations. If records found ,this function returns the index of the roomlist which holds record is related to given informations as parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the guest.
        phone - The phone of the guest.
        name - The name of the guest.
        room_no - The room`s number.
        Returns:
        Return type is integer.Returns index or -1 according to conditions.

      • changeList

        public static void changeList(Room room)
        The function takes the argument parameter the object room number given as a parameter for comparison. Then the function makes changes to the contents of the roomlist according to the function room parameter.
        Parameters:
        room - The function takes room object as a parameter.
